Posts.Content: bluegrass1 wrote: had a mammogram a week ago got a call yesterday some lady said something "wasn't right with my left breast" and needed to make an appointment for a ultrasound, so I did and its for this Friday . then today my gyno called and said to stop wearing estrogen patch that I was put on a week ago, I asked her if they spotted something she said they saw something started with a L if I remember right not lump or lesion made me think lump anyways . Now that I think about it, is it common to be taking off the estrogen before follow up ultra sound ? or they pretty sure its cancer already ? Now that I have read everything online I know now there is a bi-rad score but she never said anything about this or size or anything . I was in tears and couldn't remember what she was saying . PLEASE anyone tell me anything asap I am n knots Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Had mammogram then call back :( bluegrass1 bluegrass1

Posts.Content: Mar 13, 2016 06:05AM bluegrass1 wrote: I owe it to everyone worried about their own tests , the wifes followup ultrasound came back ok as lumnoids ?? or a patch of cysts . was told didn't look like a problem and gave a 6 month review so that was a load off . . What is lumnoids is this a normal finding ? thanks everyone and heres a prayer to everyone worrying God is With You
Posts.Title: Had mammogram then call back :( bluegrass1 bluegrass1
